On. August 16, 2019, at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) 150 
Park Row, New York, NY, Special Agent (SA) , SA 
TFO 
interviewed 
, OIG Investigator and MCC Lt. 
MCC Inmate After 
being advised of the identities of the agents and the purpose of the 
interview, provided the following information: 
On. Friday (August 09, 2019), was housed in. Cell III on 
of the Special Housing Unit within MCC. He received a visit from his 
girlfriend, that day. He was suspected of receiving 
contraband at the visit and was placed in the dry room for approximately 25 
hours. was then moved to I  tier Cell III. 
last day being housed in was Friday (August 9, 2019) 
prior to his visit. 
remembers that JEFFREY EPSTEIN would be in legal from 
approximately 9am to 9pm and he was housed in cell 220 in L Tier. 
FERNANEZ had no information regarding the death of EPSTEIN.
